BAS Label: {{ label |upper }}

{% set total = {'gpb' : 0 , 'gpa' : 0, 'gob' : 0, 'goa' : 0} %} {% for row in doc.get(label+'_details') %} {% if total.update({ 'gpb' : total.gpb + row.gst_pay_basis, 'gpa' : total.gpa + row.gst_pay_amount, 'gob' : total.gob + row.gst_offset_basis, 'goa' : total.goa + row.gst_offset_amount }) %} {% endif %} {% endfor %} {% if label in ['1a','1b'] %} {% if label == '1a' %} {% set adjustment = 'g7' %} {% else %} {% set adjustment = 'g18' %} {% endif %} {% if doc.get(adjustment)/11 %} {% endif %} {% endif %}
Voucher Type Voucher No Date Account Tax Code GST to Pay - Basis GST to Pay - Amount GST to Offset - Basis GST to Offset - Amount
{{row.voucher_type}} {{row.voucher_no}} {{frappe.utils.get_datetime(row.date).strftime("%d-%m-%y")}} {{row.account}} {{row.tax_code}} {{ "$ {:,.2f}".format(row.gst_pay_basis) }} {{ "$ {:,.2f}".format(row.gst_pay_amount) }} {{ "$ {:,.2f}".format(row.gst_offset_basis) }} {{ "$ {:,.2f}".format(row.gst_offset_amount) }}
{{ "$ {:,.2f}".format(total.gpb) }} {{ "$ {:,.2f}".format(total.gpa) }} {{ "$ {:,.2f}".format(total.gob) }} {{ "$ {:,.2f}".format(total.goa) }}
{{ label | upper }} component for {{adjustment | upper }} Adjustment {{ "$ {:,.2f}".format(doc.get(adjustment) /11) }}

{% endif %} {% endfor %}"}, {"fieldname": "_custom_html", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Custom HTML", "fieldtype": "HTML", "options": "

Summary for Company {{doc.company}}

{% if doc.get('1a') != doc.get('g9') %} {% else %} {% endif %} {% if doc.get('1b') != doc.get('g20') %} {% else %} {% endif %}

G11 - Non Capital Purchases (Including GST) {{"$ {:,.2f}".format(doc.get('g11'))}}
